blog.name: pokemon-headcanondex
blog.title: Pokémon Headcanons and More!
blog.description: All the information on your favourite Pokémon that you never knew you wanted to know!

summary: Have you done headcanons about the sinnoh quartet (Palkia, Dialga, Giratina, Arceus) yet?
question: Have you done headcanons about the sinnoh quartet (Palkia, Dialga, Giratina, Arceus) yet?
answer:
Through its infinite power, it is said that Arceus created the universe in which we live. How it did this is unknown; but studies of ancient religions suggest that it has some kind of connection to the mysterious Pokemon Unown. Some theories suggest that Unown is actually a type of “living language” or “living code” that Arceus uses in order to ‘program’ the universe.

When the universe was created, Arceus created three Pokemon, Palkia, Dialga, and Giratina

Though recent studies suggest that these three Pokemon dislike one another, and fight endlessly; they worked together to bring balance to the universe. Palkia was put in charge of maintaining the balance of space. It controls it, allowing it to warp from one end of the universe to another in no time at all. It can even enter other dimensions freely; save for one, the realm of Giratina: The Distortion World. Here, Giratina resides, acting as the glue that holds the work of Dialga and Palkia together. Though known as the “Antimatter” Pokemon, it actually has more evidence to suggest it can control gravity; the fusion of time and space.

Since these Pokemon are no short of being gods, it is unknown whether or not there is only one of each; or multiple that work together to uphold balance; perhaps in our world, and every world in the multiverse.

blog.name: pokemon-headcanondex
blog.title: Pokémon Headcanons and More!
blog.description: All the information on your favourite Pokémon that you never knew you wanted to know!

summary: How about headcanons on my precious Musharna?
question: How about headcanons on my precious Musharna?
answer:
The smoke that comes from its head is a mystery to this day. It seems to be some kind of by-product of this Pokemon psychically consuming the dreams of others; and it changes colours depending on the dream, but is most commonly pink.

The smoke has been studied, and seems to have a calming effect that can put one to sleep. As such, it has been collected and condensed to create medicine to help one sleep better. These come in many forms, but are most commonly sold as an incense that fumigates the room, and as it is breathed in, the user will fall asleep. However, it is not recommended to use too much, as you can sleep for far too long under its influence.

It also seems to guarantee that when you inhale it, you will definitely have vivid dreams during the sleep. Because of this, people have used the smoke to purposefully give themselves hallucinations and vivid dreams. Sometimes, it is combined with a Pokemon like Amoongus using Rage Powder, so that the users can stay awake and hallucinate. 
This practise, however, is illegal in most states of Unova. #LegaliseIt

blog.name: pokemon-headcanondex
blog.title: Pokémon Headcanons and More!
blog.description: All the information on your favourite Pokémon that you never knew you wanted to know!

summary: Anything about training cobalion to be tacked up and ridden like a horse by its trainer?
question: Anything about training cobalion to be tacked up and ridden like a horse by its trainer?
answer:
Cobalion is a proud and strict Legendary Pokemon. It, and its siblings, Terrakion, Verizion, and Keldeo, seek to protect the world (people and Pokemon alike) through means of victory in battle. In the ancient past, these Pokemon fought alongside humans several times in wars; but only once does their seem to be record of a human riding atop Cobalion.

Since it is a legendary Pokemon; and incredibly rare, saddles for this Pokemon aren’t exactly found in your average Pokemart. A custom saddle could be made, but the saddle is honestly the least of your worries. 
Since Cobalion is such a proud (and kinda pompous) Pokemon; it would HATE to be ridden like a common Mudsdale; as it feels that this gives an imbalance of power, and it doesnt like to be seen as lesser than others.

However, Cobalion may allow you to ride it, either into battle or otherwise, if you have the strongest bond you can possibly have with it. Be sure to let it know that in climbing atop its back, you are not belittling it; but rather that this is a method to combine both of your abilities. After a lot of hard work, Cobalion might become comfortable enough to allow this.

In order to ride it efficiently, it is recommended that you attach some kind of safety harness to Cobalion’s long, sturdy neck; and hold on to it from there. The crests upon its shoulders could be used to rest your knees if you’re tall enough; but if not, then they could be attached to the saddle for extra support.

Just be sure that when you’re riding, you don’t grab its antlers; as these are its weapons for battle, and it will become angry if you do so. When not riding it, however, it might allow you to pet it there.

blog.name: p0keprof
blog.title: Pokémon research
blog.description:
My name is Adrian, I'm a nonbinary Pokémon researcher on the making🔬✨ // Alongside my Slowking🐚 assistant I research Pokémon from a biopsychological approach // Based in Johto 🍁
Ask? Open🔍

summary: Certain grass type Pokémon can brew up concoctions inside of their bodies which can be used to either heal up status ailments,...
body:
Certain grass type Pokémon can brew up concoctions inside of their bodies which can be used to either heal up status ailments, or be highly poisonous and corrosive powders/fluids/gases.

The bulbasaur, paras and oddish evolution lines are known for this (although this ability is not limited to them).

reblog.comment:

blog.name: pokemon-plush-rescue
blog.title: Pokemon Plushie Rescue
blog.description: Over the years I've rescued a lot of Pokemon plushies from thrift stores and yard sales, and I put this blog together to catalog my different Pokemon rescues, as well as the other Pokemon plushies that have come into my life that never cease to make me smile. With the success of Dr. Sword's recovery post on my main blog, I'd figure this would also be an interesting place to have

summary: We’ve got a twofer on this one! This is Mozilla and Mozilla Mobile the Fennekins. I got them both around the same time during my...
caption: We’ve got a twofer on this one! This is Mozilla and Mozilla Mobile the Fennekins. I got them both around the same time during my first year of college. I got Mozilla at Target when I went in with my friends, and my sister got me Mozilla Mobile from a store in Disney when she went on her high school band trip. Neither of them are rescues, but Fennekin is one of my favorite starters, and they both hold good memories, so these two are very valued members of my Pokefamily

blog.name: pokedexentries
blog.title: Pokedex Entries
blog.description: Pokedex Entries from all 7 gens

title: Machamp - 68
body:
Machamp has the power to hurl anything aside. However, trying to do any work requiring care and dexterity causes its arms to get tangled. This Pokemon tends to leap into action before it thinks.

- Pokemon Ruby, Omega Ruby

tags: thank you for all the reqs!!
im gonna start sketching some tonight
summary: ALSO with these Pokémon reqs, I more than likely won’t be able to get to all of them, so don’t feel bad if I don’t do one of...
body:
ALSO with these Pokémon reqs, I more than likely won’t be able to get to all of them, so don’t feel bad if I don’t do one of your favs! If you send me more than one, I’m probs just gonna pick one!

I’ll probably do something like this again in the future - I also have commissions open at all times so if you’d like to see me tackle one of your favs (and digitally!), you could always feel free to message me 😊

blog.name: my-flourish-and-blotts
blog.title: It's about TIME.
blog.description:
I'm Liz (her/she), 21, Brazilian, Autistic. Writer, Feminist, hella gay, Multifandom Fangirl, Massive Dork, Geek, Cosplayer, etc.   
I am and always will be the optimist, the hoper of far-flung hopes and the dreamer of improbable dreams. 
I love to gif but also feel free to tag me in things I track #myflourishandblotts
